OLED_TYPE.LABEL: OLED display type
OLED_TYPE.DOC: Select the type of OLED display connected.

NUMBER_OF_BARS.LABEL: Number of bars
NUMBER_OF_BARS.DOC: Select the number of bars in the spectrum analyser.

FRAME_RATE.LABEL: Frame rate
FRAME_RATE.DOC:
Select the frame rate that the display will be refreshed (Hz)

The installation process increases the I2C speed to 800 Kbit/s but for this change to take affect you need to restart your Raspberry Pi.

Tip: a Raspberry Pi 3 with a frame rate of 50Hz provides great results.

CAVA_INPUT_METHOD_AND_SOURCE_ENABLED.LABEL: Configure CAVA
CAVA_INPUT_METHOD_AND_SOURCE_ENABLED.DOC: Enables a custom CAVA input method and source.

CAVA_INPUT_METHOD_AND_SOURCE.LABEL: CAVA input method and source
CAVA_INPUT_METHOD_AND_SOURCE.DOC:
Defines the CAVA input method and source.

Examples:

fifo,/tmp/mpd_oled_fifo (default)
fifo,/tmp/my_fifo
alsa,hw:5,0
pulse

ROTATE_DISPLAY.LABEL: Rotate display
ROTATE_DISPLAY.DOC: Select whether to rotate the display by 180 degrees.

INVERT_DISPLAY_PERIOD.LABEL: Period
INVERT_DISPLAY_PERIOD.DOC: The frequency that the display is periodically inverted to help avoid screen burn in.

I2C_ADDRESS.LABEL: I2C address
I2C_ADDRESS.DOC: Select the I2C address of the display.

I2C_BUS.LABEL: I2C bus
I2C_BUS.DOC:
Select the I2C bus depending on your model of Raspberry Pi.

/dev/i2c-1 for Model A, B Rev 2 or B+ Pi
/dev/i2c-0 for original Model B Rev 1 Pi.

SPI_RESET_GPIO_NUMBER.LABEL: I2C/SPI reset GPIO number
SPI_RESET_GPIO_NUMBER.DOC: Select the GPIO number connected to the reset pin of the display (if available).

SPI_DC_GPIO_NUMBER.LABEL: SPI DC GPIO number
SPI_DC_GPIO_NUMBER.DOC: Select the GPIO number connected to the DC pin of the display.

SPI_CS.LABEL: SPI CS line
SPI_CS.DOC: Select the CS line connected to the display.

I2C_SCAN.LABEL: I2C Device Scan
I2C_SCAN.DESC: Scan for devices on the I2C buses

I2C_WIRING_LINK.LABEL: I2C OLED wiring
I2C_WIRING_LINK.DESC: Wiring diagram for I2C OLED displays.

SPI_WIRING_LINK.LABEL: SPI OLED wiring
SPI_WIRING_LINK.DESC: Wiring diagram for SPI OLED displays.

MPD_OLED_LINK.LABEL: MPD OLED on GitHub
MPD_OLED_LINK.DESC: Visit the MPD OLED project on GitHub.
